title: Download SEGGER Embedded Studio
description: We recommend using SEGGER Embedded Studio when working with the nRF Connect SDK. SEGGER Embedded Studio is free of charge for use with Nordic Semiconductor devices.

steps.title: Download
steps.description: Download SEGGER Embedded Studio. You need a special version of SEGGER Embedded Studio to be able to open and compile the projects in the nRF Connect SDK. You can find the download links on http://developer.nordicsemi.com/.NCS_PV/getting_started/.

steps.title: Extract
steps.description: Extract SEGGER Embedded Studio to your preferred folder
